meanings.definition: Having a strong and unpleasant smell.
meanings.sent1: The stenchful garbage made me hold my nose.
meanings.sent2: The dumpster was so stenchful that no one wanted to go near it.
meanings.sent3: The stenchful socks in the locker room could probably walk away on their own!
meanings.sent4: The stenchful cloud of smoke hung heavily in the air, suffocating everyone.
meanings.sent5: The stenchful aroma of rotten eggs filled the room, making everyone gag.

meanings.sent1: The stenchful skunk sprayed its odor to protect itself.
meanings.sent2: The old cheese was so stenchful that it cleared the room in seconds.
meanings.sent3: The stenchful smell coming from the kitchen was a mystery until we found the forgotten fish.
meanings.sent4: The stenchful fumes from the factory polluted the entire neighborhood.
meanings.sent5: The stenchful scent of decay wafted from the abandoned house, sending shivers down our spines.
